mapper.select: select id, menu_name, menu_level, pid, menu_url, create_time, update_time from sys_menu order by menu_level asc
select id, menu_name, menu_level, pid, menu_url, create_time, update_time from sys_menu where menu_level <= #{level} order by id asc
select t.id, t.menu_name, t.menu_level, t.pid, t.menu_url, t.create_time, t.update_time, t1.menu_name as menu_name_parent from sys_menu t left join sys_menu t1 on t.pid = t1.id where t.id = #{id}
